meanings.meaning: take the sting out of something

vlive.korean: 이렇게 할 경우 피부 손상을 최소화 해줍니다. as this will cause less irritation to the skin. 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : Hair Removal 101 | Make Your Own DIY Shaving Cream & Shaving Foam
vlive.english: as this will cause less irritation to the skin.

vlive.korean: 자막을 최소화하였으므로 마음껏 캡처해주십시오. could create gifs and contains very few captions. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [존잘러스2] 더 로즈 우성&재형 편
vlive.english: could create gifs and contains very few captions.

vlive.korean: 자막을 최소화하였으므로 마음껏 캡쳐해주십시오. could create gifs and contains very few captions. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [존잘러스2] 에이티즈 성화&여상 편
vlive.english: could create gifs and contains very few captions.

vlive.korean: 지각했을 때 일단 최소화하는 게 제일 좋은 거 같아요. - 최소화? I think it's best to minimize things when you're late. - Minimize? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : SBS MTV <요고바라> 7화 동시생중계
vlive.english: I think it's best to minimize things when you're late. - Minimize?

vlive.korean: 도구를 최소화하는 게 5분 메이크업의 포인트! The point of five-minute makeup is to minimize the number of tools. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : SBS MTV <요고바라> 7화 동시생중계
vlive.english: The point of five-minute makeup is to minimize the number of tools.

examples.korean: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection. 발음듣기 청결한 위생 상태는 감염의 위험을 최소화하는 데 도움이 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection. 발음

examples.korean: It was a new production technique aimed at minimizing wastage. 발음듣기 그것은 낭비를 최소화하기 위한 새로운 생산 기법이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was a new production technique aimed at minimizing wastage. 발음

examples.korean: We need to minimize expenses and maximize profits. 발음듣기 우리는 비용을 최소화하고 이득을 최대화시켜야 한다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: We need to minimize expenses and maximize profits. 발음

examples.korean: Nose to tail eating minimizes waste. 발음듣기 코부터 꼬리까지 먹기는 쓰레기를 최소화합니다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Nose to tail eating minimizes waste. 발음

examples.korean: The processing plant was using hydrocarbon, so we could not completely eliminate the emissions, so what we did was minimize it by tweaking different parts of the system. 발음듣기 처리 공장은 탄화수소를 쓰는 곳이라 배기가스를 완전히 없앨 수는 없었습니다. 그래서 시스템의 여러 파트를 조정하여 배기가스를 최소화하였습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: The processing plant was using hydrocarbon, so we could not completely eliminate the emissions, so what we did was minimize it by tweaking different parts of the system. 발음
